{{actor | image = Hugo Weaving.jpg | name=Hugo Wallace Weaving | lifetime=[[4 April|April 4]], [[1960]] | played=[[Elrond]] | film=[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]]
[[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]]. | played2= | film2= | imdb=[https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0915989/ Profile] }} '''Hugo Wallace Weaving''' (born 1960) is an Australian actor who portrayed [[Elrond]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]] and in [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]]. ==Quotes== {{quote|Elrond is a fount of knowledge and wisdom: he knows a great deal about the history of the Ring and understands not just what has happened but what might happen.|Hugo Weaving, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Official Movie Guide]]''}} {{quote|Whatever the outcome, the Elves will leave Middle-earth and be forgotten. There is, therefore, a sadness about Elrond which made me decide that - although he is an Elf - he also needed to have humanity, and that is what I have tried to bring to my performance.|Hugo Weaving, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Official Movie Guide]]''}} {{quote|Having agreed to play Elrond, I realized how much had to be worked out about this character: the idea of portraying someone who is immortal, for one thing; plus the fact he is noble, wise, powerful, good - and beautiful! I began to think that he was altogether impossible to play!|Hugo Weaving, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Official Movie Guide]]''}} ==Awards== * [[2002]] - '''[http://www.cinemaclips.com/PFCS.htm PFCS Award]''', Best Acting Ensemble, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' * [[2003]] - '''[http://ofcs.rottentomatoes.com/ OFCS Award]''', Best Ensemble, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'' * 2003 - '''PFCS Award''', Best Acting Ensemble, ''Peter Jackson's The Two Towers'' * [[2004]] - '''[http://www.bfca.org/ Critics' Choice Award]''', Best Acting Ensemble, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' * 2004 - '''[http://www.nbrmp.org/ NBR Award]''', Best Acting by an Ensemble, ''Peter Jackson's The Return of the King'' * 2004 - '''[http://www.sagawards.org/ SAG Award]''', Outstanding Performance by a Cast in a Motion Picture, ''Peter Jackson's The Return of the King'' == External links == * {{WP|Hugo Weaving}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Weaving, Hugo}} [[Category:Actors and actresses]] [[Category:Narrators]] [[Category:Australian people]] [[Category:People by name]] [[Category:The Lord of the Rings (film series) cast]] [[Category:The Hobbit (film series) cast]]
